venue.name: Mt Cabot via Unknown Pond Trailhead (South)

item.description:
We begin our hike from the Berlin fish Hatchery, going first to Unknown Pond by the Unknown Pond trail, then over the Horn and the Bulge (two peaks on the NE Hundred Highest list) to the summit of Mt. Cabot by the Kilkenny Ridge trail and returning by Bunnell Notch.

You must be able to hike at a pace equal to or greater than "book time" for this hike.

Mt. Cabot is the most northerly 4000 footer in New Hampshire. Please take this into consideration when driving to the trailhead.

11 miles
2,800 feet
6:50
item.name: Mt. Cabot, The Horn & The Bulge!
